data.title: Ladon : tourism, culture and heritage
data.meta_description: Discover the heritage, culture and terroir of Ladon. Monuments, museums, discoveries, leisure activities, local specialities â¦ All essential information and addresses in a few clicks.
data.text:
Appellation of origin areas (aires d'appellation d'origine) of the commune of Ladon

Managed by the National Institute of Origin and Quality (Institut national de l'origine et de la qualitÃ©) or INAO, an agency of the Ministry of Agriculture, the areas of appellation of origin that are AOC (appellation d'origine contrÃ´lÃ©e), AOP - PDO (appellation d'origine protÃ©gÃ©e - Protected designation of origin) and IGP - PGI (indication gÃ©ographique protÃ©gÃ©e - Protected geographical indication) are designed to protect the name of an agricultural product at French or European level, to confirm its geographical origin or to guarantee compliance with a manufacturing process or a quality charter. The INAO is also in charge of the AB (agriculture biologique - organic products), STG - TSG (spÃ©cialitÃ© traditionnelle garantie - Traditional Speciality Guaranteed) and Label Rouge labels.

â The commune of Ladon is part, totally or partially, of 16 IDA appellation of origin areas (aires d'appellation d'origine).

Refine the search :

Features and products of the 16 "aires d'appellation d'origine" of Ladon

1. Val de Loire - wine IG - GIP - PGI

The Val de Loire (IDA 2282) is a European level protection (IG - GIP - PGI) which extends over the territory of 4007 communes.

It guarantees the origin and quality of 8 French products from the wine sector :
